scenario_text.value:
...Oh! It’s you, Takuma... What a relief.
I thought you were one of the enemy!
No... Neither here, nor in the shrine.
Labramon and I will look over in the forest.
Okay, got it. Be careful out there.

Yes, I will. Hopefully I can find some sort
of clue out there...

Yeah, she shouldn’t push herself so hard.
Aoi has a strong sense of responsibility...
